findUserByEmail: SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = %s AND idRole = 2
findPlayerByDocument: SELECT * FROM users WHERE document = %s AND idRole = 1
insertNewPlayer: INSERT INTO users(names, lastnames, document, address, phone, email, password, idRole) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, 1)
insertNewTournament: INSERT INTO tournaments(name, start_Date, end_date, active) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, 0)
